DOC.brief_title: Fetal Intrapartum Heart Rate FHR/ECG Study

Specifically , examine potential association maternal SSRI use fetal QT interval , ; 3. develop capacity measure uterine contraction labor use non-invasive electrode measure electrical signal uterine muscle . For study , investigational device use diagnose treat use concert current standard care monitor .
